text: hey everyone!! I have a little question, just recently I started playing around with the react boilerplate and I would like to know what is the best approach for developing with react on HubSpot, is it just for creating fancy modules?

That’s definitely the best application of it, to use with any kind of data-intensive or interactive modules that would really benefit from the power of React. E.g. we started using it to perform user filtering on blog post listings. However, my team liked developing in React’s declarative style so much that we are soon rolling out a site-wide redesign where we’ve done pretty much every module in React.

Has anyone seen or created a `.d.ts` for all that goes into modules? Would love to have something to build off of as I work with React + TS in our project.
Not exactly sure that the best way to word this is; since I’m still not 100% sure what I’m looking for.
